dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Claim
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gabe Wilner [mailto:projectilefetus@gmail.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 28, 2007 2:12 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement Claim

Hello,

I am writing to make a claim of copyright infringement against a
subscriber to your service.  I am the author and copyright holder of a
document entitled "Cyber Nations 101," which is a strategy guide for the
popular online game Cyber Nations.  The text of the current version of
this document is attached to this email.  Note that it is written using
BBCode, as it intended to be posted on forums in specific areas that I
specify.  For example, the document is posted here, for use by members
of the New Pacific Order, a group of people who play Cyber Nations (the
link shouldn't work for you, since it is not posted in a public area of
the forum due to its limited intended audience):
http://npo.assimilator.org/forum/index.php?showtopic=4134

The following post, on a forum hosted by your ISP, contains infringing
material, as the text below "STOLEN NPO CYBERNATIONS.NET MANUAL:" is a
verbatim copy of a (less recently updated) version of Cyber Nations 101:
http://forums.clantemplates.com/showpost.php?p=1032441&postcount=47

I would like to formally request that this infringing material be
removed or that access to it be disabled, as per Title 17, Section 512,
or the The United States Code.

My contact information is as follows:

Gabriel Wilner
626 University Pl, Room 432
Evanston, IL 60201
Phone: (970)668-0570
Email: g-wilner@northwestern.edu

As the owner of the copyright, I have a good faith belief that the use
of this material in the aforementioned manner is not authorized by me or
the law.  The information in this notification is accurate to the best
of my knowledge.

Sincerely,
Gabriel D. Wilner
